titles.title: This Is My Commandment, That Ye Love One Another

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
This is my commandment,
That ye love one another,
That your joy may be full.
This is my commandment,
That ye love one another,
That your joy may be full.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
That your joy may be full.
That your joy may be full!

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
This is my commandment,
That ye love one another,
That your joy may be full.
